title: Breath.of.Fire.IV-DEViANCE
description:
Breath of Fire IV (c) Capcom

CD Count.......: 01 CD(s)
Date...........: 03/2003
Protection.....: Securom


Game Notes:
~~~~~~~~~~~

It's an epic quest of magical proportions. You live in another time,
another place, devoid of all light sources. You are now part of the
underground world. Foil your menacing enemies to reach your ultimate
mission. Only you can discover the way out of the labyrinth-like dungeon
that envelops you and your friends. Escape your underground captors and
you'll reach the world of the living.


Game Features:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

- Visually stunning cel-shaded subterranean world settings

- An entirely new combined real-time and turn-based battle system

- 3-D underground worlds evolve based on your playing style for a different
gameplay experience each time through

- Encounter countless challenges, mysticism and healing potions in this
action-packed RPG adventure


Install Notes:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1) Unrar with WinRAR.
2) Burn the .cue and .bin with CDRWin or Fireburner.
3) Install the game.
4) Copy the exe-file from Crack on your CD to your installation
folder and overwrite the existing one.
5) And then play :)
